price: 181 Faites bonne mesure, gardez-vous de tricher,
arabic: ۞ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡسِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: awfū al-kayla walā takūnū mina al-mukh'sirīna
